sense.def:
The rest of something
je vse, kar od nečesa ostane.

seg.quote: He spent the rest of his life in prison.

sense.def:
Potem ko nekaj časa govorimo o enem samem posamezniku v skupini stvari ali ljudi, lahko za vse druge v skupini uporabimo izraz
the rest
.

seg.quote: It was just another grave like all the rest.
The rest of us were allowed to go home.

sense.def:
To rest
pomeni nekaj časa ne delati ničesar.

seg.quote: Go back to bed and rest.
Stop to relax and rest your muscles.

sense.def:
To get some rest
ali
to have a rest
pomeni sedeti ali ležati, ne da bi karkoli počeli.

seg.quote: I believe that the future of civilisation rests on that decision.
Final authority on all matters rests with him.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
rests somewhere
, s svojo težo pritiska na določen kraj.

seg.quote: He let her shoulders rest against his knees.
...a tub with a wide edge to rest your arm on.

cit.quote: ustaviti se na, biti uprt v

seg.quote: Her eyes travelled slowly upward and rested on his hands.

sense.def:
A rest
je tudi predmet, s katerim nekaj podpremo.

Kadar predmet, ki se premika,
comes to rest
, se ustavi.

To put someone's mind to rest
ali
to set someone's mind at rest
pomeni reči človeku nekaj, s čimer preženemo skrbi, ki ga tarejo.
